Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, ViewListenerSubscriber
public class GUI extends javafx.application.Application implements UI
The GUI class handle all the view controllers for the graphic user interface.
